data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jałoszyński, Paweł (2016): Review of Scydmaenus (Geoscydmaenus) of Madagascar (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae, Scydmaeninae). Zootaxa 4205 (3): 265-274, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4205.3.6|7 occurrences
